title: Silver Jeans Co. Women's Plus Size Suki Mid Rise Curvy Fit Straight Leg Jeans
description: THE ORIGINAL. Our Plus Size Suki Mid Rise Curvy Fit Straight Leg Jeans are a bestseller for good reason. These comfortable, hip-hugging jeans are known toflatter curvy body types & solve many common fit issues.

DESIGNED TO FIT. Suki is comfortable, and the contoured waistband ensures a zero-gap fit. This pair features 5-pocket styling with a zip fly and button closure. Available in multiple washes. Rise: 11.5" mid rise; Inseam: 29/31/33"; Leg Opening: 14.5"

SMOOTHING & SHAPING. Uniquely and expertly designed to target the waist-to-hip area, these jeans contour exactly where you need it, flattering those with a smaller waist and fuller hips for the perfect hourglass silhouette.

FOR LEGENDARY CURVES. Designed to enhance curves, these jeans create a flattering silhouette with ease in the hip and thigh to hug every angle. These mid-rise jeans are made from premium cotton-blend denim.

SIGNATURE DETAILS. These jeans for ladies are offered in high-stretch denim that compliments curves and creates a form-enhancing silhouette. The back pockets, featuring the signature small "S" scroll, work to lift and flatter.

Silver Jeans Co. Suki Mid Rise Straight Leg Jeans Plus Size - Suki is our best-selling curvy fit for good reason. Designed to enhance curves, Suki creates a flattering silhouette with ease in the hip and thigh to hug every angle. The classic mid rise is comfortable and the contoured waistband ensures a zero-gap fit.
